title: [MINDSET] Ep. 228 Finding the Extraordinary in the Ordinary with Agapi Stassinopoulos
itunes:title: [MINDSET] Ep. 228 Finding the Extraordinary in the Ordinary with Agapi Stassinopoulos
description:
Get your own copy of Ashley’s new book You Turn at youturnbook.com!

 

This week Ash brings a dear friend Agapi Stassinopoulos back onto the show for a special episode all about the extraordinary moments in life. Agapi Stassinopoulos is an author and speaker here to share how to more closely connect with spirit and the magic of life.

 

If you are feeling disconnected and want to figure out what to do with your life, Agapi and Ash share the small moments that make the biggest impact for creating the world you want to live within. 

 

Agapi and Ash dive into connections with healing, spirituality, and how to truly embrace living in the present with peace. This episode is filled with warmth, love, and depth, it's a message for your soul to feel into. Don’t miss this!



In This Episode, You’ll Learn:

  1. How to experience more pleasure and moments in life.
  2. Tips to start the day for creating a powerful and connected way.
  3. Self-soothing tools to bring you into a grounded state.
  4. How to relate to bad news.



Where You Can Find Agapi Stassinopoulos

Get her new book: Speaking with Spirit

IG: @agapisees



Athletic Greens:

 

Ready to reclaim your health and arm your immune system with nutrition?

 

Visit athleticgreens.com/YOUTURN to get a FREE 1 year supply of immune-supporting Vitamin D AND 5 FREE travel packs with your first purchase. 



SOUL CBD

 

Here is something just for you to sleep more deeply, reduce stress and heal anxiety. Visit ashleystahl.com/soul and use the code YOUTURN at checkout for 15% off your order!
